_source.text: 7 Meanwhile Colonel St George Cooke, who arrived on the 19th by way of Fort Laramie, at the head of 500 dragoons, had fared no better than the main body, having lost nearly half of his cattle.

text: 500 dragoons, had fared no **better** **than** the **main** body, having lost nearly half of his cattle.
